CustomProperties.Name: ExpandMenu
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Default menu state - expanded or collapsed

CustomProperties.Name: MenuColorPrimary
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used in rectMenuShape and icoMenu to allow themeing

CustomProperties.Name: MenuSelectedColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Passes color to rectMenuShape to allow themeing

CustomProperties.Name: BurgerIconColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Color for hamburger menu ico to allow themeing

CustomProperties.Name: MenuBackgroundColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Backdrop color for compMenuLeftNav galMenu item

CustomProperties.Name: MenuWidth
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Width of dynamic menu, changes when closed to allow click-through

CustomProperties.Name: OpenMenuWidth
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Sets how wide the menu is on open
